original_text:
Cush and Egypt were her boundless strength;
    Put and Libya were among her allies.
korean_text: 구스와 애굽은 그의 힘이 강하여 끝이 없었고 붓과 루빔이 그를 돕는 자가 되었으나

sentences.original_text: Cush and Egypt were her boundless strength
Put and Libya were among her allies
sentences.korean_translation: 브트와 리비아는 그녀의 동맹 중에 있었다
